thread.title: BRIEF-InspireMD Enters Distribution, Sales & Marketing Agreement For Cguard EPS In South Korea

title: BRIEF-InspireMD Enters Distribution, Sales & Marketing Agreement For Cguard EPS In South Korea

organizations.name: cguard eps in south korea reuters

text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - InspireMD Inc:
* INSPIREMD ANNOUNCES EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTION, SALES AND MARKETING AGREEMENT FOR CGUARD EPS IN SOUTH KOREA
* SAYS ‍AGREEMENT GRANTS SOLVIT EXCLUSIVE RIGHT TO MARKET AND SELL CO‘S CGUARD EPS FOR TREATMENT OF CAROTID DISEASE UPON KOREAN MFDS APPROVAL​
* SAYS SOLVIT WILL FUND AND MANAGE REGISTRATION AND REIMBURSEMENT SUBMISSIONS FOR CGUARD™ EPS IN SOUTH KOREA
* SAYS ‍TERM OF AGREEMENT EXTENDS FOR FIVE YEARS FOLLOWING REGULATORY APPROVAL IN SOUTH KOREA​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
